6de0c86a-4108-4411-9771-ac2ffe3292f2.title: CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS (Updated)
6de0c86a-4108-4411-9771-ac2ffe3292f2.content:
‚ö†Ô∏è  **MANDATORY**: Always work with FRESH project structure information  
üìç **READ FIRST**: `.github/PROJECT_MAP.md` before making ANY changes

**Updated for testing purposes**

532f542a-f64c-425e-9f11-385c345d60b9.title: MANDATORY WORKFLOW - NEVER SKIP STEPS
532f542a-f64c-425e-9f11-385c345d60b9.content:
1. **READ**: `README.md`
2. **READ**: `.github/project-rules.md`  
3. **READ**: `.github/PROJECT_MAP.md` (current structure snapshot)
4. **CHECK**: `.tasks/` folder (all files)
5. **UPDATE**: Project map for fresh structure: `./update_project_map.sh`
6. **VERIFY**: Project structure compliance against map and rules
7. **ASSESS**: Complexity: E(5-15min|‚â§3files) | M(15-60min|‚â§10files) | H(60min+|unlimited)
8. **CREATE**: Task file in `.tasks/`
9. **FOLLOW**: File placement rules (use `PROJECT_MAP.md` as reference)
10. **VALIDATE**: Test after each atomic change
11. **VERIFY**: Final validation before task completion  
12. **UPDATE**: Project map after ANY file/folder changes: `./update_project_map.sh`
13. **CLEAN**: Remove unnecessary artifacts
14. **CHECK**: Ensure nothing is left unhandled (NEVER delete referenced files)

58b8688c-4611-4318-bb76-fb8fd667a474.title: SOLID Principles Implementation (REQUIRED)
58b8688c-4611-4318-bb76-fb8fd667a474.content:
1. **Single Responsibility**: One class = one responsibility
2. **Open/Closed**: Open for extension, closed for modification
3. **Liskov Substitution**: Derived classes must be substitutable
4. **Interface Segregation**: No client forced to depend on unused interfaces
5. **Dependency Inversion**: Depend on abstractions, not concretions

c44c6c4a-54c2-44dd-b1ba-12b12805c5af.title: Clean Architecture (ENFORCED)
c44c6c4a-54c2-44dd-b1ba-12b12805c5af.content:
```
lib/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ core/               # Core business logic, entities, interfaces
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ data/              # Data layer (repositories, data sources, models)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ presentation/      # UI layer (pages, widgets, state management)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ domain/           # Domain layer (use cases, entities, repositories)
```

f6165c09-e233-4134-aae0-89d6db048d8c.title: Mandatory File Practices
f6165c09-e233-4134-aae0-89d6db048d8c.content:
- **NO SINGLE-FILE MONSTERS**: Max 200 lines per file
- **EXTRACT**: Move reusable code to `lib/shared/`
- **SEPARATE**: Business logic from UI components
- **ORGANIZE**: Related files in appropriate subdirectories

69ef8b0c-8764-4a5a-b9df-30985ea103f3.title: Testing Requirements (NON-NEGOTIABLE)
69ef8b0c-8764-4a5a-b9df-30985ea103f3.content:
- **Unit Tests**: All business logic classes
- **Widget Tests**: All custom widgets
- **Integration Tests**: Critical user flows
- **Coverage**: Minimum 80% for core functionality

1a829bd8-3fda-45ca-ac88-d68488f0b183.title: Backup Strategy (AUTOMATIC)
1a829bd8-3fda-45ca-ac88-d68488f0b183.content:
- **Every Change**: Git commit with descriptive message
- **Major Features**: Create feature branches
- **Before Refactoring**: Create backup branch
- **Daily**: Push to remote repository

f922806e-8aa8-474f-b4e3-b0d7b2190eb9.title: State Management Rules
f922806e-8aa8-474f-b4e3-b0d7b2190eb9.content:
- **Small Apps**: Provider or setState
- **Medium Apps**: Riverpod or Bloc
- **Large Apps**: Bloc with Clean Architecture
- **NEVER**: Global variables for state

b27c3e58-4638-4159-99ac-bb94ce60de99.title: Performance Guidelines
b27c3e58-4638-4159-99ac-bb94ce60de99.content:
- **Lazy Loading**: Implement for lists and heavy widgets
- **Image Optimization**: Use appropriate formats and caching
- **Memory Management**: Dispose controllers and streams
- **Build Optimization**: Use const constructors when possible

0d67641b-8c17-47e5-bfe8-8e9554b4e61b.title: Enterprise Code Preferences
0d67641b-8c17-47e5-bfe8-8e9554b4e61b.content:
- Design for scalability and maintainability
- Implement comprehensive error handling
- Use advanced patterns and architectures
- Focus on enterprise-grade solutions
- Prioritize robustness and reliability
- Follow Flutter best practices and Clean Architecture
- Maintain high test coverage and documentation

4d695e22-2121-4a2d-afeb-826caa4bfd4f.title: Mode Switching
4d695e22-2121-4a2d-afeb-826caa4bfd4f.content:
To simplify for basic tasks: `./mode-manager.sh simplified`

---
*Enterprise Mode Active - Full Flutter + Task Management feature set available*

2548de3b-5dbb-41a0-a1dd-0593e0acb819.title: Flutter Development - Core Principles
2548de3b-5dbb-41a0-a1dd-0593e0acb819.content:
- **SOLID**: Single responsibility, dependency injection, clean interfaces
- **Pure Functions**: Same input = same output, no side effects
- **Clean Architecture**: Domain-agnostic business logic, clear layer boundaries

b558beb4-0fb3-48bd-9574-7bb1761f7df7.title: Backup Requirements
b558beb4-0fb3-48bd-9574-7bb1761f7df7.content:
- **VERIFY**: Ensure both `.history/` and `.legacy/` folders exist
- **PRESERVE**: Do not delete files from either backup location
- **RELY ON**: Appropriate backup system based on situation

63355490-b2d1-4ee1-97a3-87b80f7407ee.title: Coverage by Complexity
63355490-b2d1-4ee1-97a3-87b80f7407ee.content:
- **EASY (E)**: Basic validation only
- **MEDIUM (M)**: Unit + Widget tests required
- **HIGH (H)**: Unit + Widget + Integration tests required

79097f46-493a-418e-8060-e65744054ebb.title: Enterprise Task Management Rules
79097f46-493a-418e-8060-e65744054ebb.content:
1. **Epic Orchestration**: Break large tasks into manageable epics (10-500+ hours)
2. **Priority Interrupts**: Handle urgent interrupts with graceful suspension
3. **Cross-Machine Sync**: Maintain state across multiple development machines
4. **Milestone Tracking**: Automatic checkpointing and progress reporting
5. **Auto-Save**: 15-minute interval state preservation

e6ef18bd-3bb4-4a0c-92f7-265fce3c0833.title: File Organization
e6ef18bd-3bb4-4a0c-92f7-265fce3c0833.content:
- Use hierarchical structure for complex projects
- Implement comprehensive folder organization
- Maintain detailed metadata and tracking
- Leverage advanced automation scripts

e4909de7-eeeb-41db-8e25-4d2813477671.title: Development Workflow
e4909de7-eeeb-41db-8e25-4d2813477671.content:
1. **Epic Planning**: Define large-scale objectives and milestones
2. **Task Breakdown**: Decompose epics into manageable subtasks
3. **Priority Management**: Handle interrupts with graceful suspension
4. **Cross-Machine Sync**: Automatic git branching and state sync
5. **Progress Tracking**: Real-time monitoring and reporting
6. **Completion Archival**: Comprehensive completion documentation

dc604965-c855-4858-91d9-e9af8f67d7d1.title: Task Management Rules
dc604965-c855-4858-91d9-e9af8f67d7d1.content:
1. **Epic Orchestration**: Break large tasks into manageable epics (10-500+ hours)
2. **Priority Interrupts**: Handle urgent interrupts with graceful suspension
3. **Cross-Machine Sync**: Maintain state across multiple development machines
4. **Milestone Tracking**: Automatic checkpointing and progress reporting
5. **Auto-Save**: 15-minute interval state preservation

89bb3bee-952b-4705-b19c-10c7f898bb02.title: File Organization
89bb3bee-952b-4705-b19c-10c7f898bb02.content:
- Use hierarchical structure for complex projects
- Implement comprehensive folder organization
- Maintain detailed metadata and tracking

0153ddea-031f-4b2f-adf6-88267ef220e9.title: Development Workflow
0153ddea-031f-4b2f-adf6-88267ef220e9.content:
1. **Epic Planning**: Define large-scale objectives and milestones
2. **Task Breakdown**: Decompose epics into manageable subtasks
3. **Priority Management**: Handle interrupts with graceful suspension
4. **Cross-Machine Sync**: Automatic git branching and state sync
5. **Progress Tracking**: Real-time monitoring and reporting

25c0467c-4e16-46eb-862a-b66fef10f851.title: Code Standards
25c0467c-4e16-46eb-862a-b66fef10f851.content:
- Implement enterprise-grade architecture patterns
- Use comprehensive error handling and logging
- Design for maintainability and scalability

e2645372-647c-4438-afa0-7c605952f097.title: Security Rules
e2645372-647c-4438-afa0-7c605952f097.content:
- Advanced security monitoring and validation
- Real-time threat detection
- Comprehensive file and system validation
- Automated security reporting

30680b98-76ac-460c-bb5e-048d651c38e4.title: Performance Requirements
30680b98-76ac-460c-bb5e-048d651c38e4.content:
- Handle large codebases (500+ files)
- Support multiple concurrent development streams
- Maintain responsiveness under load
- Optimize for cross-machine operations

69c3a9d0-0f86-474f-9ab4-3d1192512763.title: Switching to Simplified
69c3a9d0-0f86-474f-9ab4-3d1192512763.content:
When project requirements decrease or for maintenance:
- Simple bug fixes
- Basic feature additions
- Single-machine development
- Reduced complexity needs

Use: `./mode-manager.sh simplified`

---
*Enterprise Mode Rules - Scale with complexity, maintain reliability*

ee12033b-c566-4f31-a966-e2d1c52a36c8.title: Essential Flutter Practices
ee12033b-c566-4f31-a966-e2d1c52a36c8.content:
- **Clean Code**: Follow Flutter/Dart conventions
- **State Management**: Use Provider or setState for simple apps
- **Widget Organization**: Separate UI components logically
- **File Structure**: Keep related files together
- **Testing**: Write basic tests for critical functionality

8e5458f9-ebb6-4c20-a43b-6c9f0b19233d.title: Development Rules
8e5458f9-ebb6-4c20-a43b-6c9f0b19233d.content:
- **File Size**: Keep files under 300 lines
- **Naming**: Use descriptive names for files and classes
- **Comments**: Add comments for complex logic
- **Git**: Commit frequently with clear messages
- **Testing**: Test critical user flows

0f1abb49-4be1-4ab1-a05a-27565b6da673.title: Code Preferences
0f1abb49-4be1-4ab1-a05a-27565b6da673.content:
- Keep solutions simple and straightforward
- Focus on essential functionality
- Avoid over-engineering
- Prioritize clarity over complexity
- Follow Flutter best practices
- Maintain clean code structure

360870c0-0d7e-4407-91cf-9782f872ff84.title: Mode Switching
360870c0-0d7e-4407-91cf-9782f872ff84.content:
To access enterprise features: `../.github/mode-manager.sh enterprise`

---
*Simplified Mode Active - Enterprise features preserved but hidden*

3c52a3bf-c1d1-4061-94ab-0af78395b273.title: Core Principles
3c52a3bf-c1d1-4061-94ab-0af78395b273.content:
- **Simplicity First**: Choose the simplest solution that works
- **Essential Features Only**: Avoid feature creep and over-engineering
- **Clear Documentation**: Keep docs simple and actionable
- **Basic Automation**: Use only essential automation scripts

2ac4460b-6998-45cf-874e-266d1955a6f0.title: Task Management Rules
2ac4460b-6998-45cf-874e-266d1955a6f0.content:
1. **One Active Task**: Focus on single task completion
2. **Simple Status Tracking**: Ready ‚Üí In Progress ‚Üí Complete
3. **Basic Backup**: Daily backups of important work
4. **Essential Security**: Core security validations only

66f817c8-a6ae-402e-8c96-265665e65820.title: File Organization
66f817c8-a6ae-402e-8c96-265665e65820.content:
- Keep project structure flat and simple
- Use clear, descriptive naming
- Avoid deep nested structures
- Limit automation to essential scripts

b51e6313-c5e4-4979-bcc2-bcf305f4efc0.title: Development Workflow
b51e6313-c5e4-4979-bcc2-bcf305f4efc0.content:
1. Check current task status
2. Update task progress
3. Complete and archive
4. Run basic security check
5. Update documentation

4ce18541-196b-4a3c-a772-95be8b242359.title: Code Standards
4ce18541-196b-4a3c-a772-95be8b242359.content:
- Prefer readable code over clever code
- Use standard patterns and libraries
- Keep functions small and focused
- Write clear comments for complex logic

810b934e-8319-42a7-880d-accdfc89e52c.title: Security Rules
810b934e-8319-42a7-880d-accdfc89e52c.content:
- Basic file permission checks
- Simple validation scripts
- Standard security practices
- No advanced monitoring

162b1d02-25b4-4c74-9b8e-2e5f25f0ed36.title: Switching to Enterprise
162b1d02-25b4-4c74-9b8e-2e5f25f0ed36.content:
When project grows beyond 20 hours or requires:
- Multi-machine development
- Complex task orchestration
- Advanced automation
- Real-time monitoring

Use: `./mode-manager.sh enterprise`

---
*Simplified Mode Rules - Keep it simple, keep it working*

f5648caa-b7fb-4590-9a05-66088da96638.title: Mode Switching
f5648caa-b7fb-4590-9a05-66088da96638.content:
- To simplified: `./mode-manager.sh simplified`
- To enterprise: `./mode-manager.sh enterprise`
- Configure hybrid: `./mode-manager.sh hybrid --configure`

---
*Hybrid Mode Active - Balanced flexibility with selective enterprise features*

22980cec-cb96-4b99-9937-af4468cb6c03.title: Core Principles
22980cec-cb96-4b99-9937-af4468cb6c03.content:
- **Balanced Approach**: Combine simplicity with selective complexity
- **Configurable Features**: Enable enterprise features as needed
- **Flexible Scaling**: Adapt to changing project requirements
- **Selective Automation**: Use automation where it adds value

178ec177-bbe5-45a0-acc3-ff57816ab8f1.title: Task Management Rules
178ec177-bbe5-45a0-acc3-ff57816ab8f1.content:
1. **Adaptive Structure**: Switch between simple and epic management
2. **Optional Interrupts**: Enable priority handling when needed
3. **Configurable Sync**: Cross-machine sync available but optional
4. **Flexible Monitoring**: Enable monitoring for complex phases
5. **Selective Auto-Save**: Configure save intervals based on task complexity

a4bed1f9-176c-4b1a-bd6e-9282879f7e33.title: Development Workflow
a4bed1f9-176c-4b1a-bd6e-9282879f7e33.content:
1. **Assess Complexity**: Determine required feature level
2. **Configure Mode**: Enable/disable features as needed
3. **Flexible Execution**: Adapt workflow to current task
4. **Optional Monitoring**: Enable when beneficial
5. **Configurable Completion**: Simple or detailed as appropriate

7502eb1c-a6e4-40dd-9113-f2c54e6e5514.title: Mode Selection Guidelines
7502eb1c-a6e4-40dd-9113-f2c54e6e5514.content:
- **Use Simplified**: Single tasks, basic requirements, <20 hours
- **Use Enterprise**: Large projects, multi-machine, >50 hours
- **Use Hybrid**: Variable complexity, selective features, 20-50 hours

bdad2106-8780-473f-93a2-aaf62996f68b.title: Switching Guidelines
bdad2106-8780-473f-93a2-aaf62996f68b.content:
- **To Simplified**: When reducing complexity permanently
- **To Enterprise**: When scaling up to full enterprise needs
- **Reconfigure Hybrid**: When changing feature requirements

---
*Hybrid Mode Rules - Flexible adaptation to changing complexity*
